text: The Pogues are an English Celtic punk band. They were founded in 1982 in London. Shane MacGowan is the lead singer. Joe Strummer also played with them. They are best known for their Christmas song "Fairytale of New York", recorded with Kirsty MacColl.Kirsty MacColl == References == == Other websites == *Band's web site Category:1982 establishments in England Category:1980s British music groups Category:1980s Irish music groups Category:1990s British music groups Category:1990s Irish music groups Category:2000s British music groups Category:2000s Irish music groups Category:2010s British music groups Category:2010s Irish music groups Category:British punk bands Category:Musical groups established in 1982 Category:Musical groups from London
title: The Pogues
